text:
The level WARN and INFO will not be recognized as itself. Instead the level 
DEBUG will be displayed. This causes if the ConversionPattern contains "%-5p". 
If I only write "%p" it works. I believe the error is, because after the word 
WARN and INFO there will be two blanks. FYI, my log format in Chainsaw2 
is "TIMESTAMP LEVEL [CLASS] MESSAGE".

Cheers, 
Martin
creator: bugzilla-apache@wheel.ch
sdeboy@iname.com
text: This might be resolved by using trim around the toLevel call in logfilepatternreceiver, but if someone uses %3p it won't work...so I'm not sure of the best way to deal with this in a general way, or if we should bother trying to support %3p.

creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text: *** Bug 43141 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
